comments:
I tried to edit a jsp file I had recently closed down and the editor threw a nasty error page (see below).

I finally tracked it down to an end tag typo.
The editor should not fail due to such simple typos.


        <select name="myForm.shipperLocations" >
        </:select>


----------------
